content: by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 17 standing single_crochet in the first bphdc after any ch2sp 7tr ch2 7tr single_crochet in the fourth bphdc from r16 single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the ch2sp single_crochet in the next bphdc 7tr ch2 7tr repeat join with a slip_stitch 12 petals 24ch2sp 48sc 11 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 18 standing single_crochet in any ch2sp made between the petals insert your hook in the second bphdc from r17 grab the first treble_crochet and make fpdc around both of them double_crochet before the next treble_crochet fpdc around the next treble_crochet repeat till ch2sp ch2 fpdc around the next treble_crochet double_crochet before the next treble_crochet fpdc around the next treble_crochet repeat to the 6th treble_crochet double_crochet after that treble_crochet grab the next treble_crochet and insert your hook in the 3rd bphdc from r17 and fpdc around both of them single_crochet in the next ch2 space repeat join with a slip_stitch 12sc 168pfdc 144dc 12ch2sp 12 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own round 19 standing bpsc around any single_crochet from the previous round bphdc around each of the next double_crochet from the previous round skip all fpdc till ch2sp single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the ch2sp bphdc into each of the next double_crochet single_crochet bpsc around the next single_crochet repeat join with a slip_stitch 144bphdc 12bpsc 24sc 12ch2sp 13 this is a free pattern designed by tally s crafts you may use the photos as long as you credit me and link to my website https //www tallyscrafts com/ or instagram @tallyscrafts you are not allowed to post the pattern and the photos as your own
